@dev before setting up any user wallet, all buyers/sellers use a single buyer/seller address, which are maintained by Beston.

devdoc.author: Yining Hu
devdoc.details: To do: Removing rold based access control makes payments successful. However, this can be added manually as "requires"contract currently assume one buyer account and one seller account, should develop an additional wallet contract and allow new user registration

AgentConfirmTransaction(string).details: To do: to allow seller to redeem without agent/buyer to approve without agentremoved onlyRole(AGENT_ROLE)

BuyerApprove(string).details: when implementing the api and front end, buyer should have the option to proceed without or with verificationremoved onlyRole(BUYER_ROLE)

BuyerSendPayment(string).details: Partial payment is sent to the seller, however, can change depending on the agreementTo do: should only allow buyer to make no more than 1 deposit for each product

constructor.details: before setting up any user wallet, all buyers/sellers use a single buyer/seller address, which are maintained by Beston.the same goes for ownership tracking in DigitalTwin.sol.

agentaddr.details: Roles are referred to by their bytes32 identifier. These should be exposed in the external API and be unique. To do: to add a mapping to check if token exists and insert the requirements in query functions

devdoc.title: EscrowService Contract, forked from https://github.com/AleRapchan/escrow-service

AgentCancelTransaction(string).notice: If conditions does not met: escrow agent revert to buyer.

AgentConfirmTransaction(string).notice: If conditions are met: escrow agent releases to seller.

BuyerApprove(string).notice: Buyer can approve the payment with or without verification

BuyerDeny(string).notice: Buyer can deny the payment upon unsatisfactory verification result or for other reasons.

BuyerSendPayment(string).notice: Buyer can make a deposit to products on offer

GetBalance(address).notice: when testing, web3.eth.getBalance returns a string, which is inconvenient

setAddr(address).notice: to get the deployed DigitalTwin instance for accessing stored variables

userdoc.notice: Building a single role access control Escrow Service using OpenZeppelin Escrow and RBAC
